chapters.title: Chapter 46:  Working Leather
chapters.info: Welyn Kajima, p. 682—Dedicated in his middle years. Toveine thinks he smiles too much. He is the “husband” of Jenare. Before coming to the Black Tower, he was a clerk in Arafel—he looks like a clerk. He wears his hair in braids and bells just like Jahar Narishma. See also Ablar, Logain; Kurin, Mezar; Sandomere, Donalo.
